-- | Parser for OS X static archive format.
--   
--   Parser for OS X static archive format.
@package osx-ar
@version 0.11


-- | Data.OSXAr is a module for parsing an OS X static archive into a list
--   of its member files and its symbol table.
module Data.OSXAr

-- | Parse an OS X archive into a set of contained objects and a lookup
--   table for fast lookup of which member file contains a symbol.
parseOSXAr :: ByteString -> (Map Int ArchiveEntry, Maybe (Map String Int))
data ArchiveEntry
ArchiveEntry :: String -> Int -> ByteString -> ArchiveEntry

-- | File name.
filename :: ArchiveEntry -> String

-- | File size.
filesize :: ArchiveEntry -> Int

-- | File bytes.
filedata :: ArchiveEntry -> ByteString
instance Eq ArchiveEntry
instance Show ArchiveEntry
